name: Phone in Your Pc (But Its Not Real)
name_original: Phone in Your Pc (But Its Not Real)
description:
I Made this game under 1 Day (24 Hours) from Scratch with new Idea

Note : Play in Full Screen to Check Battery's

Play with your character in Phone's Screen under your pc

It feels like you are playing in your phone. But its not your real phone.

HOW TO PLAY

* COLLECT BATTERIES TO KEEP CHARGED YOUR PHONE

* AND DON'T TOUCH THE APPS

* USE RIGHT LEFT KEYS TO MOVE YOUR PLAYER
